name: RecordSetGroup
description: The AWS::Route53::RecordSetGroup resource creates record sets for a hosted zone. For more information about constraints and values for each property, see POST CreateHostedZone for hosted zones and POST ChangeResourceRecordSet for resource record sets.

properties.name: Comment
properties.description: Any comments you want to include about the hosted zone.

properties.name: HostedZoneId
properties.description: The ID of the hosted zone.

properties.name: HostedZoneName
properties.description: The name of the domain for the hosted zone where you want to add the record set.

properties.name: RecordSets
properties.description: List of resource record sets to add.
